name: CarVup
description:
Although a platform game with a decidedly cute look, Car-Vup has little in common with others of the time. The clue as to why is in the titular pun - although you don't carve anything up as such.

You're at the controls of a car across a landscape made up of colourless girders, and your task is to drive over each of these in turn, which colours them in. By default, upon reaching the end of each platform you turn around, but you can jump across the gap by pressing fire. There are enemies to avoid contact with; these follow pre-programmed movement paths.

shot.caption: Title screen
Instructions
Building world - you're controlling brave car named Arnie
Building world - main task is to drive over all girders to colour them
Building world - chopper buddy is transporting you to the next level
Building world complete - a doggy is rescued
Nightmare world - jumping is the key to reach higher (lower) girders
Nightmare world - rewarded with 25k points after BONUS letters taken
Nightmare world - the red devil appear if you're slow with colouring
Nightmare world complete - a piggy is rescued
Nature world - successfully helicoptered to the 2nd level
Nature world - the lawn mover is fast and deadly threat
Nature world - don't touch enemies or you'll lose a life
Nature world complete - a tiger is rescued
Prehistoric world - TURBO notice signifies incoming red devil
Prehistoric world - just killed enemy with one of your weapons
Prehistoric world - 6th level is bonus level in each world
Prehistoric world complete  - a duck is rescued
Toy world - now you're armed with simple one-bullet pistol
Toy world - even toys can be dangerous and steal your life
Toy world - throwing bomb will always come in handy
Toy world complete  - a mouse is rescued
Music world - Arnie is momentally protected by the shield
Music world - jumping directly to the 'jaws' of saxophone
Music world - another level finished so chopper buddy is here
Music world complete  - a squirrel is rescued
Western world - the red devil is going to catch you in a while
Western world - who will survive the collision - you or locomotive?
Western world - collecting fruit & letters is the aim of bonus level
Western world complete  - a teddy is rescued
Last world - sometimes you can freeze an opponent for short period
Last world - these girders looks exactly like zips
Last world - ugly head on the left is main boss - Captain Grim
Game Over
